metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5440 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.5.49 and earlier, 5.6.30 and earlier, and 5.7.12 and earlier and MariaDB before 5.5.50, 10.0.x before 10.0.26, and 10.1.x before 10.1.15 allows remote administrators to affect availability via vectors related to Server: RBR.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5440` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-client - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-common - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-server - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

percona-xtradb-cluster-server - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-server-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-source-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.27-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mysql-5.7 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.13-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
percona-server-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
